verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in dawng a,
verses.2: “Ka thugente limtakin hong ngai unla, ka thu nong ngaihna uh nong hehnepna uh hisak ni.
verses.3: Thu ka gen theih nading hun hong pia unla, ka gen khit ciangin na ut uh leh hong zahpih un.
verses.4: “Keiʼ kitot pih pen mihing hi lo hi. Bang hangin lung tom lo ding ka hi hiam?
verses.5: Kei hong en dih un. Lamdangsak taak hi lo ka hi hiam?
verses.6: Keima tunga thupiang ka ngaihsut ciangin lamdang sa mahmah in lau-in ka liing hi.
verses.7: “Bang hangin Pasian in migilote khantosak a, hausakin liansak ahi hiam?
verses.8: A tate uh nuam takin a khantohna, a u a nau, a suan a khakte uh a punna a mu ding dongin a nungta uh hi.
verses.9: Pasian in amauteʼ inn sungah lungkhamna tungsak lo a, amaute in lauhuaina thuak kha ngei lo uh hi.
verses.10: A bawngte uh pung a, tatolh cih omngei lo hi.
verses.11: Tuuno bangin a naupangte uh tai khia-in kimawl uh a,
verses.12: tamngai le harp lasakna aw tawh a kituakin a lam uh hi.
verses.13: Amaute a nuntak sungin cithei mahmah uh a, gentheihna tuak se loin nuam takin a si hiat uh hi.
verses.14: “Migilote in Pasian nawlkhiin uh a, Pasian in amauʼ nuntak ding a deihsakte thei nuam lo uh hi.
verses.15: Pasianʼ na sep ding kisam sa se lo uh a, Pasian kiang a thunget phattuamna om kei, ci uh hi.
verses.16: Amauʼ thahatna hang bek tawh a gina kisa uh a, amauʼ ngaihsutna le keiʼ ngaihsutna kigamla hi.
verses.17: “Migilo paʼ meivak kisukmitsak ngei ahi hiam? Amaute khat beek in lungkhamna tuak ngei ahi uh hiam? Pasian in hehna tawh migilote gim pia ngei ahi hiam?
verses.18: Huih in a letkhiat buhkungte, le huihpi in a mutkhiat buhsi bangin amaute bawl ngei ahi hiam?
verses.19: “Pasian in a paʼ khialhna hangin a ta gim pia hi, na ci uh hi. Tua bang hi lo! Pasian in a mawhte teek mah gim pia henla, amauʼ mawhna hangin gim pia ahihna theisak hen.
verses.20: Mawhneite amauʼ mawhna hangin gimna thuaksak henla, Vanglian paʼ hehna theisak tahen.
verses.21: Mi khat a nuntakna a bei khit ciangin, a naupangteʼ nopsakna phawk thei nawn ahi hiam?
verses.22: Mi khat in Pasianʼ tungah thu hilh thei ding ahi hiam? Vanglian pa tungah thu khen thei ding ahi hiam?
verses.23: “Mi pawl khatte a cithei mahmah in si a, lungmuang tak le lungnuam takin om uh a,
verses.24: an nek tui dawn a kicingin a nei uh hi.
verses.25: Mi pawl khatte ahihleh nopsak cih thei kha ngei loin lunggimin a si uh hi.
verses.26: Ahi zongin a kibangin a vekpi-in si-in kivui a, than in amaute tuamcip hi.
verses.27: “Na lungsim sung uh ah na ngaihsutna uh, kei nong siatsak nopnate uh ka tel mahmah hi.
verses.28: Siatna a gamta, mi lian paʼ inn, koi ah om ta ahi hiam, na ci uh hi.
verses.29: “Khual zinzin mite tawh kiho ngei lo na hi uh hiam? Amauteʼ thugente, thei lo na hi uh hiam?
verses.30: Pasian hehin, mite gim a piak ciangin migilote peng tawntung zawsop hi.
verses.31: Migilo pa a gamtatna bangin a thukkik ding, migilo pa mawhsakin a langpang ding kuamah om lo hi.
verses.32: Migilo pa a kivui ciangin a hankhuk kicing a,
verses.33: mi tul tampi in amah kha-in hoihtakin lei tawh kivuk hi.
verses.34: “Tu-in note in a mawknapi tawh hehnep nong sawm uh hi. Na gen uh thu khempeuh zuau thu vive hi lel hi,” a ci hi.
